validation_proteins.name: Ubiquitin
validation_proteins.notes: Well-studied protein, ideal for validation. Compact globular structure.

validation_proteins.name: Crambin
validation_proteins.notes: Small protein, fast-folding. Good starting point for testing.

validation_proteins.name: Villin Headpiece
validation_proteins.notes: Very small, helical protein. Fast-folding model system.

validation_proteins.name: Protein G (B1 domain)
validation_proteins.notes: Mixed alpha/beta protein. Good test for secondary structure formation.

validation_proteins.name: Lysozyme
validation_proteins.notes: Larger protein with multiple domains. Challenging test case.
